component.name: KYC
component.definition: "Calculated from the KYC identification data (very thin data)"

component.name: Questionnaire1
component.definition: "Main questionnaire, not mandatory, but important for arbitrators (no way to have high enough TS from the beginning without it)"

component.name: Questionnaire2
component.definition: "Calculated from the KYC identification data (very thin data)"

transactionEventScore.name: TransactionFrequency
transactionEventScore.idea: "Maximum contribution is 10 80% of max contribution corresponds to 10,000 Txs per month or N0.8 = 10,000 or rxN0.8 = 400 for day-by day"

transactionEventScore.name: Turnover
transactionEventScore.idea: "Maximum contribution is 30 80% of max contribution corresponds to 100,000 COTI per month or T0.8 = 100,000 or rxT0.8 = 4,000 for day-by day calculation"

transactionEventScore.name: AverageBalance
transactionEventScore.idea: "Maximum contribution is 30 80% of max contribution corresponds to 10,000 COTI avg balance in month or B0.8 = 10,000 or rxB0.8 = 400 for day-by day calculation"

transactionEventScoret.name: DepositedBalance
transactionEventScoret.idea: "Maximum contribution is 30 80% of max contribution corresponds to 10,000 COTI avg balance in month or D0.8 = 10,000 or rxD0.8 = 400 for day-by day calculation"

badEventScore.name: FillingTheQuestionnaire
badEventScore.definition: "A person filling questionnaire too frequent is probably cheating"

badEventScore.name: IncorrectTransaction
badEventScore.definition: "It is to be defined, how to catch it"

badEventScore.name: DoubleSpending
badEventScore.definition: "It is to be defined, how to catch it"

disputedEventScore.name: NonFulfillment
disputedEventScore.idea: "Not fulfilling a jury decision to pay or settle in other way"

disputedEventScore.name: Claim
disputedEventScore.idea: "A person sending too much claims to the arbitration "

disputedEventScore.name: ChargeBack
disputedEventScore.idea: "Calculate chargeback rate for a month, apply the fine if it is larger than the standard(~2%)"

transactionEventScore.name: TransactionFrequency
transactionEventScore.idea: "Maximum contribution is 30 80% of max contribution corresponds to 1,000,000 Txs per month or N0.8 = 1,000,000"

transactionEventScore.name: Turnover
transactionEventScore.idea: "Maximum contribution is 20 80% of max contribution corresponds to 10,000,000 COTI per month or T0.8 = 10,000,000"
